content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting various entities, including:
- PipeGroup (fluid system=36678, position=-18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=36681, position=-12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=36682, position=-8.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=36684, position=-10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid system=36685, position=-7.5, 23.5)

### Electricity network
Consists of small electric poles positioned at:
- Position (-16.5, 21.5)
- Position (-16.5, 19.5)
- Position (-15.5, 19.5)
- Position (-19.5, 22.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities, such as the automation science pack in the lab.

### Errors when crafting items
- Verify that you have enough resources to craft the required items (e.g., Iron Gear Wheels) before initiating the crafting process.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity onto a tile before attempting to place it.
